nodes.text: Senoloro was an island city on the planet Auratera.

Established on an equatorial island, surrounded by six inland seas, Senoloro was the largest city on on Auratera. Largely populated by Humans and Duros, Senoloro's economy was driven by agriculture and trade. Containing the world's largest spaceport, the city was the landing place of most offworld freighters, as few as they were. The government of Senoloro was autocratic, ruled by a Governor who was appointed for life. During the Galactic Civil War, Lerella Rosral held the high office, earning the contempt of her constituents due to her power grabs.
